content: affinity cowl designed by crochet creations by wendy the affinity cowl is made from 1 ball of yarnsmiths pebble haze prints double knitting you can get 2 cowls out of the one ball hence the name one for you and one for a friend yarn yarnsmiths pebble haze prints dk colour sd100 saltburn 150g / 435m makes 2 cowls notions size 5 mm crochet hook darning/tapestry needle minimum skill level intermediate beginners abbreviations chain chain tr2tog treble 2 together cluster worked into same stitch tr3tog treble 3 together cluster worked into same stitch repeat repeat slip_stitch slip_stitch skip - skip pattern chain 90 without twisting join with slip_stitch to first stitch in chain to make large ring row 1 ch3 tr2tog cluster in the same stitch *ch1 sk1 chain tr3tog cluster in next chain repeat from * until one stitch remains ch1 skip last chain and slip_stitch into top of tr2tog cluster to join round row 2 slip_stitch across into the ch1 space ch3 tr2tog cluster in the same space *ch1 skip st below tr3tog cluster in next ch1 space repeat from * until one stitch remains ch1 skip last stitch and slip_stitch into top of tr2tog cluster to join round keep working in a round without turning repeat row 2 14 more times this will mean you ll have 16 row in total fasten_off and sew in ends and make another one for a friend this pattern is intended for personal use only you may not distribute or sell copies of this pattern without prior consent please feel free to share the link to this pattern and spread the love many thanks xx any pattern queries then please contact me
